import React from 'react' import One from '../../assets/images/1.jpg' import Two from '../../assets/images/2.jpg' import Three from '../../assets/images/manage-orders.jpg' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import './navbar.css'; import Login from '../Login/Login' import RegisterAsSeller from '../RegisterAsSeller/RegisterAsSeller' import Product from '../Product/Product' import ViewAllCategoriesForCustomer from '../Category/VIewAllCategoriesForCustomer/ViewAllCategoriesForCustomer' import Welcome from '../Welcome'; const Navbar = (props) => { let brand=[]; props.filteringDetails.brands.map(data => { brand.push(data) }) for(let data in brand) { console.log(data) } return (

Shop By Category

{props.filteringDetails !== null ?

{props.filteringDetails.fields[0]} {props.filteringDetails.values[0]}

BRAND

: null}
Previous Next
) } const mapStateToProps = state => { console.log(state.category.filteringDetails, "filtering details in navbar ") return { error: state.product.error, products: state.product.products, filteringDetails: state.category.filteringDetails } } export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Navbar)
